structure.unit: RAILROAD COMMISSION -- RATES AND SERVICE OF COMMON CARRIERS

law.history: Repealed 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 184, sec. 8. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 795, 796, 799, 801.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Separate coaches or compartments for white and colored passengers.
